pages.text: Shell armors have a unqiue proprty of allowing you to gain a defense boost when sneaking. These armors provide knockback resistance due to their nature of being defensive sets. While all armors can be made outright, they are overall cheaper in resources if you spend time to upgrade them with the next tier of material. The first tier being crab shell.
The next tier shells can be upgraded with is nautilus shells.
The final tier of the shell armors is the Turtle shell armor. This armor is better than iron in terms of defense.
